modName: Massive Cloud Storage Network - Whiterun Mansion Support
summary: Adds Massive Cloud Storage Network containers to Whiterun Mansion.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/irve9XK.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[heading]Required Mods[/heading]
Morgaloth's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54285/?]Massive Cloud Storage Network[/url] v2.02 Complete
nTr4nc3's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37121/?]Whiterun Mansion[/url]
Make sure patch loads after Massive Cloud Storage Network AND Whiterun Mansion.

I'm sorry, but Home Patches are no longer Compatible with anything but MCSN Complete V2.02+

[heading]Description[/heading]
This patch was requested by someone, and I'm very happy he pointed out this Excellent Player House Mod. Really, it is one of the coolest I've seen. While the Whiterun Mansion has General Stores integrated into it, GS can be turned off with a flip of the switch in the very well thought out Control Room.

Five containers are added to the Mansion,

Food Basket, on the counter near the Fireplace/stove
Alchemy Jar on the Alchemy Table
Soul Gem Bowl on the Enchanting Table upstairs
Soul Gem Bowl on the Enchanting Table downstairs
Ore Bucket by the Forge out back

This patch does not make ANY changes to Whiterun Mansion and is completely compatible with GS.

[heading]Change Log[/heading]
07/13/14 Uploaded Version 2.0 - works correctly with MCSN v2.0 Complete
